Crise ambiental é grave para maioria de investidores em infraestrutura
Segundo pesquisa, 75% deles consideram resposta do governo aos problemas atrasada e insuficiente
06 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Mariana Grazini
Tarde demais  A crise ambiental é grave para quase 70% dos empresários do setor de infraestrutura, diz pesquisa da Abdib (associação de infraestrutura de base) com a consultoria EY. Para 82,5%, a situação pode afetar negócios. Na opinião de quase 75%, a resposta do governo ao problema foi atrasada e insuficiente.

Environmental crisis is serious for most infrastructure investors
According to research, 75% of them consider government response to problems delayed and insufficient
06 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Mariana Grazini
Too late The environmental crisis is severe for nearly 70% of infrastructure entrepreneurs, says a survey by Abdib (a grassroots infrastructure association) with consultancy EY. To 82.5%, the situation may affect business. In the opinion of almost 75%, the government's response to the problem was delayed and insufficient.
